Translations.Text: illa `ala ezvacihim ev ma meleket eymanuhum feinnehum gayru melumin
velekad halakne-l'insane min sulaletim min tin
summe ce`alnahu nutfeten fi kararim mekin
summe halakne-nnutfete `alekaten fehalakne-l`alekate mudgaten fehalakne-lmudgate `izamen fekesevne-l`izame lahma. summe ense'nahu halkan ahar. fetebarake-llahu ahsenu-lhalikin
velekad halakna fevkakum seb`a taraik. vema kunna `ani-lhalki gafilin
veenzelna mine-ssemai maem bikaderin feeskennahu fi-l'ard. veinna `ala zehabim bihi lekadirun
feense'na lekum bihi cennatim min nehiliv vea`nab. lekum fiha fevakihu kesiratuv veminha te'kulun
veseceraten tahrucu min turi seynae tembutu bidduhni vesibgil lil'akilin
veinne lekum fi-l'en`ami le`ibrah. nuskikum mimma fi butuniha velekum fiha menafi`u kesiratuv veminha te'kulun
